response.raw_message_text:
{
    "risk_factors": [
        ("number of prior arrests", "high", "5 prior arrests increases the likelihood of recidivism"),
        ("conviction history", "high", "prior convictions indicate a disregard for the law"),
        ("height and weight", "low", "while size can contribute to aggression, it does not appear to be a significant factor here"),
        ("marital status", "medium", "living alone may indicate a lack of support system"),
        ("education level", "medium", "lower education levels are sometimes associated with higher recidivism rates"),
        ("employment history", "low", "having held a job for at least part of the year is a positive sign"),
        ("drug and alcohol use", "low", "no recent drug or alcohol use reduces the risk of recidivism"),
        ("mental health status", "low", "no reported feelings of depression in the past month"),
        ("family background", "medium", "growing up in an urban area and a household of 3 can sometimes contribute to criminal behavior, but this is not a strong indicator on its own"),
        ("religious beliefs", "low", "lack of belief in a higher power does not necessarily correlate with criminal behavior")
    ],
    "prediction": "YES",
    "confidence": 70
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 20-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 5 times and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 3 inches and weighs between 200 and 224 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He does not have a high school diploma or GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 1 job during the year. He has not used any drugs in the past four years and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 3, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
